26  SFML2(sf::RenderTarget& target);
27  virtual ~SFML2();
28 
29  inline void EnsurePrimitiveType(sf::PrimitiveType type)
30  {
31  if (m_Buffer.getPrimitiveType() != type)
32  {
33  Flush();
34  m_Buffer.setPrimitiveType(type);
35  }
36  }
37 
38  inline void EnsureTexture(const sf::Texture *texture)
39  {
40  if (m_RenderStates.texture != texture)
41  {
42  Flush();
43  m_RenderStates.texture = texture;
44  }
45  }
46 
47  inline void AddVert(int x, int y, float u = 0.0f, float v = 0.0f)
48  {
49  if (m_RenderStates.texture)
50  {
51  u *= m_RenderStates.texture->getSize().x;
52  v *= m_RenderStates.texture->getSize().y;
53  }
54 
55  m_Buffer.append(sf::Vertex(sf::Vector2f(x, y), m_Color, sf::Vector2f(u, v)));
56  }
57 
58  inline void Flush()
59  {
60  if (m_Buffer.getVertexCount() > 0)
61  {
62  m_Target.draw(m_Buffer, m_RenderStates);
63  m_Buffer.clear();
64  }
65  }
